tool_description: GitHub brings together the world's largest community of developers to discover, share, and build better software. This is a Community Listing of the GitHub GraphQL API.
name: GitHub GraphQL
title: GitHub GraphQL

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.description: Edit Variable values to ensure a successful API response & customize your request. Example queries can be found in the [About](https://rapidapi.com/rapidapi/api/github-graphql2/details) page!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://github-graphql2.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-graphql2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://github-graphql2.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "github-graphql2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
